name: Meridian
description:
A map expansion mod focused on making the world of Risk of Rain more Explorable! With 6 new stages (more coming soon :) ) to enjoy.

If you are looking to suggest stages, enemies and what not, please contact me on Discord either through direct messages or by pinging me in the 'Rick of Rain?' server!

Contributors:

Glasus = Basalt Crab Sprites 

THIS IS A DEVELOPER ONLY BUILD, DO NOT SHARE.
author: Winslow, Altzeus, retroPacifist
